original_title: Marriage and Other Four Letter Words
overview: Can a young and restless married couple find satisfaction living in the suburbs? Desperate, they finally decide to expand their horizons, and our swinging twosome engage in all kinds of different couplings. In the end they find that "true love is the best thing yet!"
tagline: It's Been a Long, Hot Honeymoon... And The Fun Is Just Beginning!
title: Marriage and Other Four Letter Words
